key_features: 2% Unlimited Cashback on Wine & Dine, Online Food Delivery, Movies & Digital Entertainment, Taxi & Automobile, Luxury Goods.
Access to Over 1,300 Airport Lounges via Mastercard Travel Pass App provided by Dragonpass
50% Off Green Fees at golf courses across the region
bill_payment: With CIMB 0% i.Pay Plan (IPP) enjoy 0% interest instalment payments with a one time processing fee.
A one time processing fee of 3% of transaction amount for 3 or 6 months, and 5% for 12 months tenure, 6% for 24 months tenure
Earn cash rebates on instalment payment plan and save on your daily expenses.
cash_back: 2%* Unlimited Cashback on Wine & Dine, Online Food Delivery, Movies & Digital Entertainment, Taxi & Automobile, Luxury Goods.
* To qualify for the 2% unlimited cashback on Eligible Categories, you must spend at least S$1000 and above posted in the same statement month.
Unlimited 1%* Cashback on all other spends
* To qualify for the 2% unlimited cashback on Eligible Categories, you must spend at least S$1000 and above posted in the same statement month.
dining: 2% Unlimited Cashback on Wine & Dine, Online Food Delivery, Movies & Digital Entertainment, Taxi & Automobile, Luxury Goods.
shopping: 2% Unlimited Cashback on Wine & Dine, Online Food Delivery, Movies & Digital Entertainment, Taxi & Automobile, Luxury Goods.
installment: With CIMB 0% i.Pay Plan (IPP) enjoy 0% interest instalment payments with a one time processing fee.
A one time processing fee of 3% of transaction amount for 3 or 6 months, and 5% for 12 months tenure, 6% for 24 months tenure
Earn cash rebates on instalment payment plan and save on your daily expenses.
Minimum of S$300 and maximum of S$30K can be converted per transaction.

eligibility: Applicable for New-to-CIMB card holders only
Customers need to apply through MoneySmart to be eligible
Log into your MoneySmart account and submit your claim by 30th April 2025

fees.overlimit_fee: S$50 or 5% of the excess amount, whichever is higher.
